main event: An extremely bright light was observed falling straight down and then ascending, with changing colors of bright red, blue, and yellow.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50 yards wide and had a white light or globe in the center., It left a trail that appeared to be smoke or burning debris., The motion of the light was described as smooth and controlled., The sighting lasted for one minute., No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: an extremely bright light changing colors
witness description: military personnel involved in the operation
